name: The House at the Corner of Muller St. and Amor Blvd.
name_original: The House at the Corner of Muller St. and Amor Blvd.
description:
Andy has come home for break only to find an empty house...

Controls:

     WASD or arrow keys to move

     Space to interact and talk

Credits

Lead Dev/ArtAndy BaeMusicAntti Luode

Made for GGJ 2019 - 

     'What home means to you'
